page.title: 13THE C.E. PRIMARY SCHOOL H.B.
page.content: The school was built in 1858. It cost Â£732:10:0 to build, two years later when the infant room was built the total went to Â£832.The school was built to accommodate 150 pupils but now there are only 60 children.The first school master was a Mr.John Houghton his salary was Â£57:10 shillings a year. There was a school house where John Houghton lived with his wife and children.The house is now a staff room , office and a first & second year junior classroom.The school has one hall and that was used for a classroom then.Nowadays children come to school and have the same teacher through the day.The subjects are maths ,art, english, and athletics, science, history and geography.The cane is not allowed and the teachers are nice.
